description: Sync AI coding rules from external Git repositories and generate config files for Cursor, Copilot, Continue.

configuration.title: Turbo AI Rules
turboAiRules.protectUserRules.descriptio: Protect user-defined rules from being overwritten during sync (recommended)
turboAiRules.userPrefixRange.description: File prefix range for user-defined rules in directory mode (default: 80000-99999)
turboAiRules.blockMarkers.description: Block markers for single-file mode to separate auto-generated and user content
turboAiRules.blockMarkers.begin.descript: Begin marker for auto-generated content block
turboAiRules.blockMarkers.end.descriptio: End marker for auto-generated content block
turboAiRules.parser.strictMode.descripti: Enable strict validation: require id, title, and valid metadata in all rules (recommended for managed rule libraries)
turboAiRules.parser.requireFrontmatter.d: Require YAML frontmatter in rule files (when disabled, plain Markdown files are accepted)
turboAiRules.parser.excludeFiles.descrip: Exclude specific files from being parsed as rules (e.g., README.md). Use filename with extension.
turboAiRules.adapters.custom.description: Custom adapter configurations for various AI tools
turboAiRules.adapters.custom.items.prope: Automatically update config files when rules change
Output path relative to workspace root (e.g., 'rules' for directory, '.my-ai-tool.md' for file)
Output as single file or directory structure
Filter rules by file extensions (e.g., ['.md', '.mdc']). Omit or leave empty to sync all files without filtering.
Organize files by source ID in subdirectories (directory mode only, default: false)
Use original filename from source (directory mode only, default: true). When false, uses 'ruleId.md' format.
Generate index file with all rules (directory mode only)
Name of the index file (directory mode only)
Sort rules by ID, priority, or none (single-file mode only). Default: priority
Sort order: ascending or descending (single-file mode only). Default: asc
turboAiRules.sync.conflictStrategy.prior: Use highest priority rule when conflicts occur
turboAiRules.sync.conflictStrategy.skip-: Skip duplicate rules, keep first occurrence
turboAiRules.enableSharedSelection.descr: Enable shared rule selection state (stored in workspace, can be committed to Git for team sharing)
turboAiRules.selectionFilePath.descripti: Path to the shared selection file (relative to workspace root)
